ingredients.ingredient: 1 (29 ounce) can baked beans with pork

cookingTips: Combine sauce ingredients in the baking dish before adding beans to ensure even distribution
Don't overmix beans as they can break apart; stir gently to combine
Bake uncovered to allow flavors to concentrate and develop deeper caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can simple pantry ingredients transform canned beans into a more flavorful, homemade-tasting side dish?
